description: This file defines a route layout component for a Qwik-based web application, including import statements, server-side data loading, caching configuration, and UI composition with Header, Footer, and slot content.

methods.name: onGet
methods.description: A request handler that sets cache control headers for optimal caching and performance.

methods.name: useServerTimeLoader
methods.description: A route loader that provides the current server time in ISO format as data to the component.
